// Utility for persistent balance storage in localStorage
const BALANCE_KEY='satAppBalance';export function getSavedBalance(){const raw=localStorage.getItem(BALANCE_KEY);if(!raw)return 0;const parsed=parseFloat(raw);return isNaN(parsed)?0:parsed;}export function saveBalance(balance){localStorage.setItem(BALANCE_KEY,balance.toString());}export function clearBalance(){localStorage.removeItem(BALANCE_KEY);}
